USA IRS IRA

	
		https://www.investor.gov/additional-resources/retirement-toolkit/self-directed-plans-individual-retirement-accounts-iras
		
	
Kinds

	
		Traditional:
		
		
		
		
		Roth:
			Contributions made with after tax funds.
			
			Earnings and withdrawals are tax free.
			
			Caveats:
				[ ] Wealth needs to be in account for 5+ years.
				[ ] You need to be over 59.5 years young to withdraw
					gains tax free.
		
		
		SEP
		
		
		Simple
